author: @fattoquotidiano
title: Lavoratori Volkswagen pronti allo sciopero contro le chiusure. E in Inghilterra i sindacati annunciano battaglia con Stellantis - Il Fatto Quotidiano
text:
Com‚Äôera inevitabile, sale il livello dello scontro tra rappresentanti dei lavoratori e case automobilistiche che prospettano chiusure e licenziamenti. Il sindacato metalmeccanico tedesco Ig Metall ha annunciato una possibile prima tornata di scioperi gi√† a partire da luned√¨, primo giorno utile dalla data di scadenza della tregua con Volkswagen . Il colosso tedesco minaccia di chiudere tre siti tedeschi e di mandare a casa fino a 15mila addetti , la prima mossa di questo genere nel dopoguerra della Germania. Il sindacato ha aperto alla possibilit√† di ridurre del 10% i salari al fine di scongiurare licenziamenti e chiusure ma la trattativa √® ancora in corso.
In una nota Volkswagen ha definito ‚Äúnon sufficienti‚Äù le proposte dei sindacati , che comporterebbero un risparmio di costi di 1,5 miliardi di euro l‚Äôanno. Il gruppo afferma comunque di ‚Äúmantenere il dialogo aperto‚Äù con i rappresentanti dei lavoratori per raggiungere ‚Äúsoluzioni percorribili‚Äù. Ig Metall, dal canto suo, ha definito ‚Äúestremamente deplorevole‚Äù il fatto che il gruppo abbia respinto le ‚Äúproposte costruttive‚Äù che erano state avanzate.
Secondo Ig Metall Volkswagen ‚Äúsi √® spinta oltre i limiti di quello che i lavoratori possono accettare‚Äù. Quella che pianificano ora sarebbe la prima grande protesta dal 2018, potrebbe essere di alcune ore o di un‚Äôintera giornata. Il prossimo incontro con l‚Äôazienda √® fissato per il 9 dicembre.
In Inghilterra il sindacato ‚ÄòUnite the Union‚Äô annuncia battaglia per difendere la storica fabbrica di veicoli commerciali Vauxhall di Luton (Regno Unito), che Stellantis ha annunciato di voler chiudere. ‚ÄúIn risposta all‚Äôannuncio che Stellantis sta proponendo di chiudere l‚Äôimpianto di Luton, afferma un portavoce del sindacato, la proposta messa sul tavolo √® uno schiaffo in faccia ai nostri delegati di Luton , dove Vauxhall produce veicoli da 120 anni ‚Äú.
‚ÄúQualsiasi beneficio questo possa portare per la fabbrica di Ellesmere Port , prosegue il sindacalista, questo non √® accettabile . Siamo pronti a sostenere i nostri iscritti nel fare tutto il possibile per assicurare che la storica fabbrica sia mantenuta a Luton e chiediamo al governo di fare altrettanto‚Äù.

author: LA NACION
title: Hor√≥scopo de Sagitario de hoy: viernes 30 de agosto de 2024 - LA NACION
text:
Si pretende obtener una r√°pida prosperidad material, sepa que depender√° de su excelente criterio intelectual y de su perseverancia en el trabajo. Fechas: 23 de Noviembre al 22 de Diciembre
Qu√© le espera a Sagitario el viernes 30 de agosto Amor: Ac√©rquese a ese amigo que hace d√≠as le est√° solicitando ayuda. Sepa que la calidez de su afecto nutrir√° su esp√≠ritu y lo har√° sonre√≠r de nuevo.
Riqueza: Posiblemente su jefe comience a demandarle demasiado y esto lo supere. Organicen una reuni√≥n y busquen juntos un orden para cada una de las prioridades.
Bienestar: Sepa que una dieta basada en frutas, verduras y mucho l√≠quido lo ayudar√° a depurar su cuerpo. Trate de abandonar los malos h√°bitos que ha mantenido durante meses.
Qu√© dec√≠a el hor√≥scopo de Sagitario en el d√≠a de ayer Oc√∫pese de los asuntos y trate de resolverlos lo antes posible. Deje de involucrarse en situaciones complicadas que no le ata√±en personalmente.
Amor: Inicia un per√≠odo para que intente conectarse emocionalmente con su enamorado de una manera diferente. Si no pueden solos, busquen ayuda.
Riqueza: Si tiene que firmar un contrato, no ser√° malo que aguarde y se asesore para otro momento. Busque ayuda en alguna persona de su confianza y avance por el camino correcto.
Bienestar: Aprenda a disfrutar de la calidez de su hogar junto a su familia, pero ante todo, no se olvide de finalizar con cada una de las tareas cotidianas que adquiri√≥.
Consult√° el hor√≥scopo de todos los signos del zodiaco. Otras predicciones para hoy
Aries | Tauro | G√©minis | C√°ncer | Leo | Virgo | Sagitario | Libra | Escorpio | Capricornio | Acuario | Piscis |

author: Ayden Runnels, The Texas Tribune
title: West Texas measles outbreak climbs to 58, with four saying they were vaccinated
text:
The annual Conservative Political Action Conference includes Vice President JD Vance, Elon Musk, Steve Bannon and Tom Homan as key speakers.
Bitter temps and life-threatening wind chills are expected through noon Thursday. Protect people, pets, plants, pipes.
by Ayden Runnels, The Texas Tribune

ÂæóÁõä‰∫é‰ªñ‰ª¨Â≠úÂ≠ú‰∏çÂÄ¶ÁöÑÂä™ÂäõÔºåÂ∞èÊä•Êò•ÁöÑÂ∫îÁî®ËßÑÊ®°ÈÄêÂπ¥ÊîÄÂçá„ÄÇÊï∞ÊçÆÊòæÁ§∫ÔºåÂ∞èÊä•Êò•Â∫îÁî®Èáè‰ªé2022Âπ¥ÁöÑ20‰∏áÁõÜÂ¢ûËá≥2024Âπ¥ÁöÑ60‰∏áÁõÜÔºåÂ∑≤Êàê‰∏∫ÊàêÈÉΩÂÜ¨Êú´ÂàùÊò•ÁªøÂåñÁöÑ‰∏ªÂäõÂÜõ„ÄÇÊØèÈÄ¢ËäÇÂÅáÊó•ÂâçÂ§ïÂíåÂÜ¨Êó•ÁôæËä±ÈöêÈÄÄ‰πãÈôÖÔºåÂ§©Â∫úÂπøÂú∫„ÄÅ‰∫∫Ê∞ëÂçóË∑ØÁ≠âÂüéÂ∏ÇÂä®ËÑâÔºåËúÄÈÉΩÂ§ßÈÅìÈÄöÊÉ†Èó®„ÄÅÂÆΩÁ™ÑÂ∑∑Â≠ê„ÄÅÂ§ßÊÖàÂØ∫ÂèäÂêéÂ≠êÈó®„ÄÅÊë©ËØÉÊ±†Á≠âÂéÜÂè≤‰∫∫ÊñáË°óÂå∫ÔºåÂùáÊúâÂÆÉ‰ª¨Èùì‰∏ΩÁöÑË∫´ÂΩ±ÔºåÂ°´Ë°•‚ÄúÊò•ÊôØÁ©∫Á™óÊúü‚Äù„ÄÇÂ∞èÊä•Êò•Âú®ÂÖ®Â∏ÇÂüéÂ∏ÇÁªøÂåñ„ÄÅÊôØËßÇÊâìÈÄ†‰∏≠ÁöÑÂπøÊ≥õÂ∫îÁî®ÔºåÊó¢Èôç‰Ωé‰∫ÜÊàêÊú¨Ôºå‰πüÁïô‰Ωè‰∫Ü‰π°ÊÑÅ„ÄÇ

author: CNN Newssource
title: Cartels recruiting more teenagers to smuggle migrants in U.S.
text:
Cartels recruiting more teenagers to smuggle migrants in U.S.
By Lupita Murillo
Click here for updates on this story
TUCSON, Arizona (
KVOA) ‚Äî Sheriff Mark Dannels tells News 4 Tucson that within the past 28 months, his department has detained over 3,000 individuals related to border issues.
Additionally, there have been nearly 500 high-speed pursuits.
The sheriff adds over 100 juveniles have been involved in Smuggling over that time.
One high-speed pursuit occurred in February involving a 15-year-old driver from Tucson operating a stolen vehicle.
According to Sheriff Dannels, the suspect was recruited by cartels via social media, with payments ranging from $800 to $1200 per person.
The chase unfolded on Highway 90, with speeds reaching up to 100 mph.
Sheriff Dannels stated that the 15-year-old will face trial as an adult. In the same timeframe, over 100 juveniles have been implicated in smuggling activities.
Sheriff Dannels says this is a daily problem that also includes adults.
‚ÄúWe cannot ignore it we all have to step up as leaders. Mayor‚Äôs sheriffs commissioners, governors United States if we don‚Äôt work together and politics to us, we‚Äôre never gonna solve this Problem.‚Äú Dannels added.
Please note: This content carries a strict local market embargo. If you share the same market as the contributor of this article, you may not use it on any platform.

author: Marisabel Diaz
title: Un aguacero azota Maracaibo horas antes del encendido de Bella Vista - La Verdad
text: A tan solo horas del tradicional encendido de luces de Bella Vista, previsto para la noche de este viernes 1 de noviembre, un fuerte aguacero azota Maracaibo y parte de San Francisco. La lluvia inici√≥ alrededor de la 1.15 de la tarde y desde entonces no ha cesado. Usuarios en redes sociales compartieron videos en los que se ven algunas calles y avenidas de la capital zuliana inundadas. El periodista Lenin Danieri comparti√≥ a trav√©s de su cuenta en la red social X (antes Twitter) un audiovisual en el que ve la avenida Bella Vista, a la altura de los Tribunales, inundada. La misma situaci√≥n se report√≥ en desde la calle 45 hasta la 78 de los sectores Tierra Negra, urbanizaci√≥n La Estrella, Las Playitas y 18 de octubre. Por otra parte, el periodista Jhorman Cruz inform√≥ tambi√©n en X que desde las 2.00 de la tarde el Puente sobre el Lago de Maracaibo cerr√≥ ambas cabeceras para impedir la circulaci√≥n de veh√≠culos, esto como medida preventiva ante el aguacero. El Instituto Nacional de Meteorolog√≠a e Hidrolog√≠a (Inameh) [pronostic√≥ la ma√±ana de este viernes precipitaciones durante casi todo el d√≠a](https://laverdad.com/pronostican-lluvias-con-mas-extension-en-la-tarde-y-noche-este-viernes-en-el-zulia/), pero con mayor extensi√≥n en horas verpertinas y nocturnas. EL DILUVIO. Poderoso aguacero afecta las principales ciudades del Zulia. Esa es la avenida Bella Vista a la altura de los tribunales. Video cortes√≠a. Esto como medida preventiva al aguacero que est√° cayendo en Maracaibo, San Francisco y La Rita. author: Christopher Johnson
title: Solidarity Economy And The Economics Of Abundance
text: Editor‚Äôs note: in this two-part interview, GEO member Jessica Gordon-Nembhard presents a brief summation of her research on solidarity economics and cooperatives. Jessica is best known for her history of African-American co-ops, [Collective Courage], which can be purchased directly from the publisher [here](use code JGN14 for a 20% discount). How do we transform societal structures and pave the way to economic democracy? Professor Jessica Gordon-Nembhard explores the potential of cooperatives and solidarity economics as pathways towards economic democracy and justice. Drawing on historical examples from the civil rights movement and the Knights of Labor in the 1880s, Gordon-Nembhard demonstrates how cooperative economics can counteract the exploitation inherent in capitalist systems. She underlines the importance of communal ownership and shared decision-making as mechanisms for wealth redistribution, arguing that such models can liberate communities from economic exploitation. In this alternative approach, power inequities are challenged, and economics becomes a system where everyone can participate and benefit, realizing possibilities through pooled resources and collective action. In part 2 of our conversation with Professor Jessica Gordon-Nembhard she goes deeper into the power of cooperatives and their positive impacts on society and democracy.

author: LUIS TATO
title: Climate scientists say that global warming is making extreme weather events more frequent and intense
text:
Tags
As featured on
The developing world needs trillions of dollars in climate aid, but who should pay for it? Wealthy nations? Big polluters? Countries that got rich burning fossil fuels? All of the above?
The last two years exceeded on average a critical warming limit for the first time as global temperatures soar "beyond what modern humans have ever experienced", Europe's climate monitor said Friday.

author: Times of Malta
title: Christian spirituality: The Eucharist commits us to the poor
text:
‚ÄúThe Eucharist commits us to the poor. To receive in truth the body and blood of Christ given up for us, we must recognise Christ in the poorest, his brethren.‚Äù (CCC 1397) This paragraph from the Catechism of the Catholic Church gives us an important message today, the solemnity of Corpus Christi. The Eucharistic celebration is an encounter with the Risen Christ who gives us the strength to go out of ourselves and to open ourselves to others with love.
The Eucharist helps us recognise the face of Christ in everyone and, most especially, in our poor and marginalised brothers and sisters, wherever and whoever they may be. At the Last Supper, especially in the washing of the feet narrated in John‚Äôs Gospel, Jesus wanted to show his apostles ‚Äì and us ‚Äì that living true ‚ÄòEucharistic lives‚Äô means precisely living lives of service to others, especially those in greatest need: ‚ÄúYou call me teacher and Lord; and you are right, for so I am. If I, then, your Lord and teacher, have washed your feet, you also ought to wash one another‚Äôs feet. For I have given you an example, that you also should do as I have done to you.‚Äù (Jn 13:13-15)
St John Chrysostom was very clear in his words: ‚ÄúDo you wish to honour the body of Christ? Do not ignore him when he is naked. Do not pay him homage in the temple clad in silk, only then to neglect him outside where he is cold and ill-clad. He who said: ‚ÄòThis is my body‚Äô is the same who said: ‚ÄòYou saw me hungry, and you gave me no food‚Äô, and ‚ÄòWhatever you did to the least of my brothers you did also to me‚Äô‚Ä¶ What good is it if the Eucharistic table is overloaded with golden chalices when your brother is dying of hunger? Start by satisfying his hunger and then, with what is left, you may adorn the altar as well‚Äù (Homilies on the Gospel of Matthew 50:3-4).
In caring for the vulnerable and the oppressed, we are called to bandage wounds with concrete acts of love; but we must also look for and address the root causes that create the conditions for exclusion, for poverty, for hunger, for any lack of respect shown to the dignity and life of every human being.
We cannot be indifferent to suffering; we cannot allow anyone to go through life as an outcast - Pope Francis, Fratelli Tutti
Promoting justice is a requirement of our Eucharistic identity. Pope Francis writes: ‚ÄúWe cannot be indifferent to suffering; we cannot allow anyone to go through life as an outcast. Instead, we should feel indignant, challenged to emerge from our comfortable isolation and to be changed by our contact with human suffering. That is the meaning of dignity.‚Äù ( Fratelli Tutti , 68)
Today we are called to renew the commitment to take an active part in mass on the Lord‚Äôs Day, and to live a Eucharistic life. The Eucharist is not a prize for those who are perfect. It is the food of those who are weak but want to be strengthened by God‚Äôs grace. We approach the Eucharist not with a selfish desire to receive our reward, but with a spirit of generosity and willingness to commit to solidarity with the poor and marginalised, and to be a visible sign of mercy, of love, and of justice.
Mgr Joseph Galea Curmi is auxiliary bishop of the Malta archdiocese.
j.galea.curmi@maltadiocese.org
